content.question: Which of the following best explains why some European colonists intermarried with Native Americans?

choices.label: To create economic and diplomatic relationships between Europeans and Native Americans
To ensure that specific European countries could establish claims to land in North America
To prevent the enslavement of certain groups of Native Americans considered allies
To establish a new culture that synthesized European and Native American elements

content.answer: To create economic and diplomatic relationships between Europeans and Native Americans

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
